description: This classic casual dress belt by Steve Madden is designed for the versatile boy and fits your lifestyle no matter who you are or how you wear it. This boys belt is made of bonded leather that is smooth to the touch and solid in construction. This Steve Madden belt is a great belt for jeans as well as a work dress belt. Madden's unique culture and product designs are inspired by their committment to lead trends. The company's focus on now-ness has earned it rave reviews from all genders for their fashionable yet competitively priced products. The company Popularized the notion of dressy-popular and continues to man The forefront of trends.
